snippet.title: [EN] Flowxie's Mission - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
【Flowxie's Mission is here】
Play as Flowxie the Fairy, and defeat the monsters with your magic.
Prevent your fairy treasure from being stolen.

The game is arcade type, so it will end until you run out of life. Reach as many points as possible and get coins to spend in the store and get special stuff. 

Available now on Google Play!: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ProjectZorroTeam.FlowxiesMission

For more information, visit the official website for detail.
https://projectzorroteam.com/flowxies-mission/

Also visit our website and social networks for the "Project Zorro Team" projects
Project Zorro Team Official Site: https://projectzorroteam.com/
"Project Zorro" (provisional name) Official Site: https://project-zorro.com/
X: https://twitter.com/FlowxieFairy
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100091549350248
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/flowxiefairy/
Threads: https://www.threads.net/@flowxiefairy

ESRB Rating: EVERYONE with In-game Purchases
Clasificación (A) Para todo público. SMEC, México.
Rated PEGI 3 (Digital Purchases)
Todas as idades, Classificação Indicativa (ClassInd), Brasil
